last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: With mere hours to go before Selection Day, Manju pays Javed a visit that could risk everything. Anand has some tough questions to answer.

name: Selection Day
overview: Two teen cricket prodigies struggle against their overbearing father and a system stacked against them to realize their own ambitions and identities.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Intent on landing his sons professional cricket contracts on Selection Day, Mohan brings them from their village to Mumbai months before the trials.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Mohan's sons learn Mumbai cricket clubs value member fees over talent. Watching the boys play, an infamous former coach is moved to fulfill an old vow.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The boys start at Weinberg Academy, but Mohan mistrusts Tommy and investigates him while working at a new job. Anand gets stuck in a financial bind.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Mohan makes a scene at the school after one of his sons is punished. Tension builds between Manju and Javed. Anand takes a big financial risk.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: At the team’s first tournament match, Radha aims to impress a talent scout while Manju is distracted by a cryptic poem. Anand has an awkward encounter.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Javed’s envy grows with Radha’s glory. When Mohan and the boys are evicted, Anand seizes a chance. Radha gives worried Manju their aunt's phone number.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Manju feels torn between loyalty to his family and Javed’s new gestures of friendship. Mohan receives an unexpected business proposal.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Radha prepares to play in the Harris Shield semifinals. With his double life weighing on him, Manju must make a tough choice on the day of the match.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Mohan’s business takes off, while a resentful Manju has heated confrontations with Javed and Radha. Anand receives a threat.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The Harris Shield final begins with a curveball that leaves everyone gobsmacked -- and the surprises keep coming. Meanwhile, Mohan makes a confession.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Manju and Radha receive some important news. Distressed about his mother’s whereabouts, Radha crosses a line. A major accusation leads to a showdown.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: With mere hours to go before Selection Day, Manju pays Javed a visit that could risk everything. Anand has some tough questions to answer.
